WFI2017 Lets me ask you few questions, before you get started.
1. What is your name ?
2. Your Gender ?
3. How old are you?
4. Input your weight (In Kg.)
5. Enter Your Height
6. Choose you activity :
Sedentary lifestyle
Slightly active lifestyle 1–3 days/week
Moderately active lifestyle 3–5 days/week
Active lifestyle 6–7 days/week
Very active lifestyle twice a day
//Profile_Menu Edit
